title: Project loan provisions to impact earnings due to limited pass-through: Banks to RBI
description: Banks face challenges passing on higher provisions due to competition and pressure to maintain relationships. RBI proposed a 5% provision increase for project, commercial, and real estate loans. Lenders may find it difficult to raise rates, impacting project viability and borrower bidding process.
